mapper.select: SELECT sum((SELECT COUNT(a.activity_id) FROM represent_activity a WHERE a1.`status` = 4 AND a.activity_id = a1.activity_id)) AS finishCount, COUNT(a1.activity_id) AS `count` FROM represent_activity a1 LEFT JOIN represent_activity_record r1 ON a1.activity_id = r1.activity_id WHERE r1.user_id = #{userId}

select activity_id, activity_type, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, title, start_time, end_time, address, status, participate_conut, content, npc_claim, open_flag, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type = 'activity_categories' AND d.dict_value = a.activity_type) AS activityTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type = 'activity_status' AND d.dict_value = a.`status`) AS statusName from represent_activity a WHERE `status` IN (1, 2) ORDER BY start_time DESC

select a.activity_id, a.activity_type, a.remark, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.create_by, a.title, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.address, a.status, a.participate_conut, a.content, a.npc_claim, a.open_flag, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type = 'activity_categories' AND d.dict_value = a.activity_type) AS activityTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type = 'activity_status' AND d.dict_value = a.`status`) AS statusName from represent_activity a where a.activity_id = #{activityId}
